import React from 'react'; import Header from './../Layout/Header'; import Footer from '../Layout/Main/MainFooter'; import Banner from '../Sections/Banner'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; const blogGrid = [ { image: require('./../../assets/images/blog/latest-2/b1.jpg'), title: 'Cargo flow through better supply chain visibility.', category: 'Factory', date: '13' }, { image: require('./../../assets/images/blog/latest-2/b2.jpg'), title: 'The future of factories in the coming years', category: 'Industry', date: '18' }, { image: require('./../../assets/images/blog/latest-2/b3.jpg'), title: 'The factors that countries create are energy', category: 'Energy', date: '19' }, { image: require('./../../assets/images/blog/latest-2/b4.jpg'), title: 'Cargo flow through better supply chain visibility.', category: 'Factory', date: '13' }, { image: require('./../../assets/images/blog/latest-2/b5.jpg'), title: 'The future of factories in the coming years', category: 'Industry', date: '18' }, { image: require('./../../assets/images/blog/latest-2/b6.jpg'), title: 'The factors that countries create are energy', category: 'Energy', date: '19' } ] class BlogGridPage extends React.Component { render() { return ( <>
News And Updates

Let's Checkout Our All Current News.

{blogGrid.map((item, index) => (
  • {item.date} July
  • {item.category}

{item.title}

Read More
))}
Load More
); }; }; export default BlogGridPage;
